ch0131_00_citron/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh! Hello! How are you doing today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0131_00_citron/0101_0701_02_10:
If you ever need a warm-up, just let me know.
I’ve got a machine that’d make for a great
sparring partner!
ch0131_00_citron/0601_0701_01_10:
In Kalos, we’ve got this training machine called
Super Training!
ch0131_00_citron/0601_0701_02_10:
If you’re ever in Kalos and have some time, you
should absolutely give it a try. It really helps
Pokémon get stronger!
ch0131_00_citron/0601_0701_03_10: First, you’ve got to strike the training bag!
ch0131_00_citron/0601_0702_01_10:
I strengthened my partner Pokémon with Super
Training while in Kalos.
ch0131_00_citron/0601_0702_02_10:
Apparently some Trainers want to use the machine
to train themselves. And who can blame them?
ch0131_00_citron/0601_0702_03_10:
This is it! The muscles that will make the future
bright! That’s true for people and Pokémon.
ch0131_00_citron/0602_0701_01_10:
My Pokémon Gym is set up inside Lumiose City’s
Prism Tower.
ch0131_00_citron/0602_0701_02_10:
I’m the one who created Prism Tower’s lighting
system. It’s my masterpiece.
ch0131_00_citron/0602_0701_03_10:
You should come visit Lumiose City sometime.
If you do, you should stop by my Gym, too!
ch0131_00_citron/0602_0701_04_10:
We’ve absolutely got to have a battle for the
Voltage Badge!
ch0131_00_citron/0602_0702_01_10: My little sister, Bonnie, helps out at the Gym.
ch0131_00_citron/0602_0702_02_10:
She likes to quiz challengers who come to Lumiose
Gym. It’s kind of the Gym’s theme. If you’re
planning to visit, you can look forward to the quiz!
ch0131_00_citron/0603_0701_01_10:
Maintenance machine...ACTIVATE!
Excellent... It’s working brilliantly, just like all
my inventions.
ch0131_00_citron/0603_0701_02_10:
I’ve been using a machine I created to check
Pasio’s electrical systems.
ch0131_00_citron/0603_0701_03_10:
There are many different species of Pokémon that
feed on electricity.
ch0131_00_citron/0603_0701_04_10:
Magnemite is one of those Pokémon species.
Sometimes you can find them huddled around
breaker boxes during power outages!
ch0131_00_citron/0603_0702_01_10:
After looking into it, I discovered that Pasio has no
wild Pokémon, so the island doesn’t suffer from
Pokémon-related electrical issues.
ch0131_00_citron/0603_0702_02_10:
That said, you never know when electrical troubles
could arise.
ch0131_00_citron/0603_0702_03_10: If you notice anything strange, let me know, OK?
ch0131_00_citron/0604_0701_01_10:
Pokémon sure are mysterious... Even with as far
as science has come, there’s still so much we don’t
know about them.
ch0131_00_citron/0604_0701_02_10:
That’s why I want to know more. The unknown is
the source of knowledge.
ch0131_00_citron/0604_0701_03_10:
If only we could communicate directly with
Pokémon... We’d be able to learn so much...
ch0131_00_citron/0604_0701_04_10:
Although if you have a strong bond with a
Pokémon, the two of you can understand what
the other is thinking without saying anything.
ch0131_00_citron/0604_0701_05_10:
The fascinating possibilities of science have
their charms, but bonds with Pokémon are
important, too.
ch0131_00_citron/0604_0702_01_10:
It’s possible that sometime in the future, the power
of science will allow us to speak with Pokémon.
ch0131_00_citron/0604_0702_02_10:
When that day comes, we’ll be able to deepen
the bonds we share with our Pokémon even more!
It’ll be the next generation of sync pairs!
ch0131_00_citron/0605_0701_01_10:
For a long time, I’ve been passionate about
inventing machines and doing electrical work.
ch0131_00_citron/0605_0701_02_10:
But I got so sucked into it all that other people
often had to help me out with other things in life...
ch0131_00_citron/0605_0701_03_10:
That’s why I really like to try and help other
people out now.
ch0131_00_citron/0605_0701_04_10:
Other people’s smiles make me happy, so I’ll
keep doing my best to create new inventions.
ch0131_00_citron/0605_0701_05_10:
It’d be great to connect people with one another
more and more, like circuits in a machine!
ch0131_00_citron/0605_0702_01_10:
So many things are different on Pasio than in
Kalos. The people, the surroundings...
ch0131_00_citron/0605_0702_02_10:
You and everyone else on the team have been a
big inspiration to me, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0131_00_citron/0605_0702_03_10:
I’ve learned so much from the sync pairs here.
I feel like I’m growing more and more each day.
ch0131_00_citron/1701_0701_01_10: Power on, my precious gift-giving machine!
ch0131_00_citron/1701_0701_02_10: I’d be happy to give it to you!
ch0131_00_citron/1701_0702_01_10:
You’re free to use it however you’d like. I’d be
even happier if it could inspire you.
ch0131_00_citron/2501_0701_01_10:
I’ve always been clueless about how to make
friends with others my age.
ch0131_00_citron/2501_0701_02_10: But being with you has changed that somehow...
ch0131_00_citron/2501_0701_03_10:
Now I can talk to other Trainers my age without
getting nervous.
ch0131_00_citron/2501_0701_04_10:
It’s all thanks to you. Please allow me to repay
you in some way.
ch0131_00_citron/2501_0701_05_10:
I know! Is there any kind of machine you’d like
me to make for you? Don’t be shy—I’ll grant
any request!
ch0131_00_citron/2501_0702_01_10:
I want to be useful to you and the sync pairs on
your team.
ch0131_00_citron/2501_0702_02_10:
This isn’t something I’d normally say out loud,
but you’ve really helped me find my courage.
ch0131_00_citron/2511_0701_01_10:
Because I’m a Gym Leader, I sometimes
get interviewed.
ch0131_00_citron/2511_0701_02_10:
I’m not too great at saying the right things when
I’m on camera, though...
ch0131_00_citron/2511_0701_03_10:
In interviews, I’m always asked, “What’s next
for you?”
ch0131_00_citron/2511_0701_04_10:
I usually give a pretty boring answer, like that
I want to go to an amusement park in the
Unova region.
ch0131_00_citron/2511_0702_01_10:
A show announcer who came to some of my
interviews was pretty interesting.
ch0131_00_citron/2511_0702_02_10: She said my glasses make her heart twitch!
ch0131_00_citron/2511_0702_03_10:
I don’t think I’d ever heard that before. I didn’t
entirely understand what she meant, but I was
pleased to hear it nonetheless!
ch0131_00_citron/3001_0701_01_10:
Oh! Feeling a little sluggish this morning?
Never fear! My Super Waker-Upper machine
is here!
ch0131_00_citron/3002_0701_01_10:
If you accidentally oversleep in the morning,
call me! My Trainer Dresser-Upper machine will
get you sorted in a jiffy!
ch0131_00_citron/3003_0701_01_10:
Whew, I could sure use a bite to eat right now...
Maybe I should invent a machine that can replicate
food instantaneously!
ch0131_00_citron/3004_0701_01_10:
Both exploring and inventing come with so many
amazing things to learn and discover!
ch0131_00_citron/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s kind of dark outside, isn’t it? Perhaps I can
help with that! Super Lighting System...ACTIVATE!
ch0131_00_citron/3006_0701_01_10:
Sometimes I get so excited about a new invention
that I have trouble sleeping. I can brainstorm for
hours before I even realize what time it is!
